title: $4.2 Million Worth of Stolen XRP Tokens Frozen on Binance
description: It's good news, but there's still a lot of funds missing. The exploiter made off with $113 million worth of XRP.

title: Euro-backed stablecoin trials begin in Spain
description:
Every EURM is backed on 1:1 par by euro, stored at Spanish banks, such as BBVA and Caixabank.

Spanish fintech firm MONEI has started the trials of a euro-backed stablecoin EURM under the supervision of the Bank of Spain. 

As the announcement, published on MONEI’s website on Jan. 29, specifies, the trial in the regulatory sandbox, supervised by the Bank of Spain, began in January. It features a group of individual users, limited to minimize the error margin.

The trial will examine the transaction capability of EURM: a user will verify their identity, upload the wallet, load up to 10 euros to his account and exchange them for 10 EURM. Every EURM is backed on 1:1 par by euro and stored at Spanish banks, such as BBVA and Caixabank.

Read more

title: Apple to roll out generative AI features in 2024, says Cook
description:
Apple CEO Tim Cook teased plans for the company’s generative AI features set to launch later this year, revealing a strategic focus on AI technologies.

Tim Cook, the CEO of Big Tech firm Apple, has confirmed that the company is working on generative artificial intelligence (AI) features that will be available to consumers “later this year.” 

During the company’s quarterly earnings call on Feb. 1, Cook said that he believes there will be a “huge opportunity” for the company with AI and generative AI.

As analysts attempted to press the CEO for further details on Apple’s AI plans, he said they have some things they’re “incredibly excited about” but will be talking about them “later this year.”

Read more
